com.tagnumelite.projecteintegration.api

Class APEIRecipeMapper<R extends net.minecraft.item.crafting.IRecipe<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tagnumelite.projecteintegration.api.APEIRecipeMapper<R>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    moze_intel.projecte.api.mapper.recipe.IRecipeTypeMapper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AppliedEnergisticsMappers.AEInscriberMapper, CompactCraftingMapper, CreateMappers.CreateBasinMapper, CreateMappers.CreateCompactingMapper, CreateMappers.CreateCrushingMapper, CreateMappers.CreateCuttingMapper, CreateMappers.CreateDeployerApplicationMapper, CreateMappers.CreateMillingMapper, CreateMappers.CreateMixingMapper, CreateMappers.CreatePressingMapper, CreateMappers.CreateSandPaperPolishingMapper, CreateMappers.CreateSplashingMapper, DraconicEvolutionMapper, ExtendedCraftingMappers.ECCompressorMapper, ImmersiveEngineeringMappers.IEAlloyMapper, ImmersiveEngineeringMappers.IEArcFurnaceMapper, ImmersiveEngineeringMappers.IEBlastFurnaceMapper, ImmersiveEngineeringMappers.IECokeOvenMapper, ImmersiveEngineeringMappers.IECrusherMapper, ImmersiveEngineeringMappers.IEMetalPressMapper, ImmersiveEngineeringMappers.IEMixerMapper, ImmersiveEngineeringMappers.IESawmillMapper, ImmersiveEngineeringMappers.IESqueezerMapper, WootMappers.WootAnvilMapper, WootMappers.WootFluidConvertorMapper, WootMappers.WootInfuserMapper

    public abstract class APEIRecipeMapper<R extends net.minecraft.item.crafting.IRecipe<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements moze_intel.projecte.api.mapper.recipe.IRecipeTypeMapper
    An abstract class used for converting IRecipes to EMC conversion maps. This function has a few helper variables: recipeID, mapper and fakeGroupManager This class follows closely to BaseRecipeTypeMapper with added function for special recipes with ItemStack and/or FluidStack outputs. To overwrite output, override method getOutput(IRecipe) to overwrite input, override method getIngredients(IRecipe) For an example on how to handle recipes with multiple outputs, look at ImmersiveEngineeringMappers

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  APEIRecipeMapper.NSSInput 
      static class  APEIRecipeMapper.NSSOutput
      A 'data' class to hold both a NormalizedSimpleStack and an integer denoting the output item and amount.

      • isTagException

        protected boolean isTagException(java.lang.Exception e)

      • addConversionsAndReturn

        protected boolean addConversionsAndReturn(java.util.List<net.minecraft.util.Tuple<moze_intel.projecte.api.nss.NormalizedSimpleStack,java.util.List<moze_intel.projecte.emc.IngredientMap<moze_intel.projecte.api.nss.NormalizedSimpleStack>>>> dummyGroupInfos,
                                          boolean returnValue)
        This method can be used as a helper method to return a specific value and add any existing group conversions. It is important that we add any valid group conversions that we have, regardless of whether the recipe as a whole is valid, because we only create one instance of our group's NSS representation so even if parts of the recipe are not valid, the conversion may be valid and exist in another recipe.
